name: Super Fun !
reviewBody:
Super Fun ! Honestly, it was one of the show during the French program "Coucou c'est nous", and I didn't remember it was so fun !

Maturin the Bear (reference to an old french evening program for children, "Bonne nuit les enfants"), Bob and Renate the parents and Greg - their son - are the protagonists of this short show (just 1/2 minutes per day).

Full of acid humour, big gags and some old special effects, this show succeed to make you laugh without almost any word of sex or stuff like this.

Don't miss the DVD, especially for French audience, if you liked this show.

The DVD contains about 100 minutes of non stop show.
